snippet: The Atlanta Falcons have experienced sustained success during Mike Smith’s tenure, but he still views himself as a coach at the grass-roots level.
abstract: Atlanta Falcons coach Mike Smith still views himself as a coach at the grass-roots level even though his team has experienced sustained success during his tenure.
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Falcons have experienced sustained success during Mike Smith’s tenure, but he still views himself as a coach at the grass-roots level.

headline.seo: Falcons Coach Mike Smith Is Above All a Teacher
headline.main: Leader of Atlanta Turnaround Is Above All a Teacher
headline.print_headline: Leader of Atlanta Turnaround Is Above All a Teacher
